title: Adelaide Crows Football Club acquires Legacy eSports

replies.body: Give me a Crows summoner icon, please.
YEAH YEAH! Go the Crows. My favourite AFL team aligning with my favourite OPL team. Shit just got real.
This sounds so good for a fastly growing team and all their fans
wait... whats AFL again? Is it still a thing?
what are you on void bud get your act together

What are you on, it is still australia's biggest sport and has just been birthed in China recently.
If it was a joke, it was far from funny.
You are clearly in a VOID dude..  If U live in Antarctica or at Lord Howe Island I could understand your confusion..
yeah idk where you were going with that one V0ID other than making yourself look like an idiot :P
What a great idea by a traditional sporting team to enter the world of Esports
